snippet: With his re-election campaign looming, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has enviable voter approval ratings and general support for many of his newest proposals, according to a new poll.
abstract: Sienna College poll finds that Gov Andrew M Cuomo has enviable approval ratings from New York voters and general support for many of his newest proposals, as his re-election campaign looms.
lead_paragraph: With his re-election campaign looming, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has enviable voter approval ratings and general support for many of his newest proposals, according to a new poll.

headline.main: Majority of New York Voters Say They Would Re-elect Cuomo, Poll Finds
headline.print_headline: Voters Back Another Term for Cuomo, a Poll Finds
